subject: Drugs worldwide at low price
body:
Dear customer.
This is the letter from the CanadianPharmacy. We prove that "generic" doesn't necessarily mean "expensive". If you shop for drugs online, please, read this to the end.
Our Canadian online pharmacy is happy to offer USA citizens to resort to the services of our e-shop located at CanadianPharmacy. We are the only Canadian Web pharmacy regularly monitored by FDA. CanadianPharmacy, all the generic drugs that you might need for less.
CanadianPharmacy - turn Canadian drug sales taxation system to your advantage.
Yours,Benny Frost
